title: nutildah
author: nutildah
content: Looking for suggestions of interesting niches that maybe I haven't discovered yet.Personally I'm always drawn toward- humorous gamers (Xpert Thief, graystillplays, NerdCubed)- scambaiters (Scammer Revolts, Kitboga, Jim Browning)- car crash compilations- plane crash breakdowns- caving & diving gone wrong- pretty much any kind of historical storytelling that involves mass casualtiesbut I'm looking to find new stuff to be interested in.Crypto videos are mostly terrible, and when turning on the 'Tube I'm usually looking for an escape from thinking about crypto stuff.What are your favorite genres of YouTube videos?

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: My go to Youtubers are Mr Beast, Mark Rober and PewDiePie. If you are interested in insane content, go for Mr. Beast. If you are interested in learning stuff, go for Mark Rober. If you are interested in general entertainment, go Pewdiepie. Dude Perfect has great content as well. Those are just my interests.

comments.author: landheer
comments.body: I'm a person who is always busy working, but when I have free time I always watch YouTube, and on YouTube I like to watch old movies like 1980's films and so on. and also I always see funny videos, which make me laugh.

comments.author: meser#
comments.body: The videos recommended on youtube to me these days are all about carpet washing videos  That videos are so satisfying but i can't pass without saying this: It's like they're keeping these carpets in the mud for a day or they record the carpets used by the dirtiest people in the world.

comments.author: Tallupooh
comments.body: I sometimes always watch the Korean variety show, Running Man. There are many funny and entertaining scenes. When I'm tired, I always see something funny. or sometimes I see random videos on YouTube.

comments.author: nutildah
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinBarrel on November 09, 2022, 02:57:45 PMAnything "Instant Karma" or "Win Stupid Prizes"  Yep, I like these as well... Especially the ones where an idiot driver does something dumb and then immediately gets pulled over by the cops.Quote from: meser# on November 09, 2022, 11:42:53 PMThe videos recommended on youtube to me these days are all about carpet washing videos  That videos are so satisfying but i can't pass without saying this: It's like they're keeping these carpets in the mud for a day or they record the carpets used by the dirtiest people in the world.This is hilarious and exactly what I was hoping for... Who would have guessed there was a whole genre of carpet cleaning videos on YouTube. Some videos have several million views, too.Gonna watch one right now. Oh my that's a filthy carpet.

comments.author: meser#
comments.body: Quote from: nutildah on November 10, 2022, 04:51:27 AMQuote from: meser# on November 09, 2022, 11:42:53 PMThe videos recommended on youtube to me these days are all about carpet washing videos  That videos are so satisfying but i can't pass without saying this: It's like they're keeping these carpets in the mud for a day or they record the carpets used by the dirtiest people in the world.This is hilarious and exactly what I was hoping for... Who would have guessed there was a whole genre of carpet cleaning videos on YouTube. Some videos have several million views, too.Gonna watch one right now. Oh my that's a filthy carpet.If you like that, search repairing of damaged computer or check this channel "primitive technology". Those were my oddly habits

comments.author: ModestyKK
comments.body: I like to watch funny videos that make me happy. Now watching videos on the Internet has long been a way of entertainment for young people. When I am tired, this kind of funny stuff can always relieve my fatigue.

comments.author: Sayakaaja
comments.body: I always see and listen to Japanese songs

comments.author: tuertezii
comments.body: I like to read the very open speeches of some economists, as well as the speeches of psychics.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Nothing specific to be honest but I often use it to find out how to do certain DIY home tasks. I’ve figured out how to do a lot of stuff around the house like fixing leaks. I mean, I watch music videos & nature type, animal videos too. What I’ve been using it for mostly the last couple years is home DIY.

comments.author: KEN L
comments.body: I like to listen to music on YouTube and watch some music MVs.

comments.author: 12techy1
comments.body: Some mobile phone and tv reviews, music videos, A-YEON...

comments.author: kesenos
comments.body: All kinds of clips from movies

comments.author: Emil364
comments.created_time: November 18, 2022, 01:04:00 PMLast edit: December 06, 2022, 12:05:15 AM by Emil364
comments.body: On YouTube, I like listening to music more. I love tracks with a good beat and bass. For a long time I had a problem listening to this kind of music because I didn't have a device that could capture the beauty of this music. But recently I bought myself some noise cancelling headphones https://treblab.com/blogs/news/earbuds-with-ear-hooks with a great sound transmission. It's the perfect choice for people who want to cut themselves off from the world and concentrate on their music. The earmuffs provide a comfortable and secure fit.

comments.author: SaitomoMA
comments.body: Slices of the best moments in soccer

comments.author: nutildah
comments.body: Give me some more stuff to watch on YouTube! I just finished watching Breaking Bad for the 2nd time and am now in Season 3 of Trailer Park Boys, rewatching that for the 3rd time. Whatcha got. I need something new.
